Are you launching the tests with teh jdt plugin installed?

We shouldn't have dependencies on the JDT plugin in our test suites if at all
possible.  This is probably one of those cases.

What do you mean?  I have jdt.ui checked out from HEAD....  Is there something I
am supposed to be doing?
Do you have it enabled in your launch?

Fixing our dependency on a JDT icon would require one of two things.  We could
either create a secondary test plugin that would be loaded as normal (and have
it's own repository location..yick) or we could do some trickery with dynamic
plugins.  Either solution is time consuming... if you can confirm that you are
launching with JDT (and it is actually there - you can confirm from the about
screen in the runtime workbench) please reopen.
